theLegendOfFinn.controller

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • theLegendOfFinn.controller.Manager

  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the flow of the entire game, every event is either resolved by this class or one of the sub-managers.
    Author:
    LCDPCJL

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws TickerMissingException
        Initializes the game. Must be called when a new game is requested or a game is to be loaded. Calling this method before having a ticker set is unsafe and will throw an exception.
        Throws:
        TickerMissingException - if ticker was not loaded correctly.

      • updateStage

        public void updateStage(RenderManager.Stage stage)
        Updates the game's stage.
        Parameters:
        stage - stage to update to

      • toggleMovement

        public void toggleMovement()
        Change status of the game when showing a game-stopping stage

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver()
        Updates the stage according to the player death. Ends the game

      • win

        public void win()
        Displays win message and quits.

        public void keyChange(int key)
        Handles the keys

        Gets the master renderer
        Returns:

      • loadTicker

        public void loadTicker(Ticker ticker)
        Sets the current ticker to the one specified. This method should be called if and only if the game is to be loaded.
        Parameters:
        ticker - The loaded ticker.

      • getNotifier

        Gets notifier
